content.question: Which of the following can be used to replace /* missing code */ so that the code segment works as intended?

choices.label: int onesDigit = num % 10; int tensDigit = num / 10;
int onesDigit = num / 10; int tensDigit = num % 10;
int onesDigit = 10 / num; int tensDigit = 10 % num;
int onesDigit = num % 100; int tensDigit = num / 100;

content.answer: int onesDigit = num % 10; int tensDigit = num / 10;

skill.text: 2.A: Write program code to implement an algorithm.
